hero.title: Ventured Brands
hero.subtitle: Building Tomorrow's Brands Today
hero.description: Let's journey together into industries with unbounded growth potential.

logoSection.title: We understand VCs are tough
logoSection.description: We are dedicated to finding the most tenacious and ambitious minds in four key industries.

benefitsSection.title: We understand our founders
benefitsSection.description: Bold Capital is on a mission to back the boldest founders changing industries across four verticals. Our portfolio companies have reached unicorn exits, with our founders maintaining a large amount of equity. We're here to help our founders achieve their goals and break into industries with massive growth potential.

0.title: Pre-Seed
0.description: We invest at the pre-seed stage, providing up to $750k in capital to help founders grow to the next level.

1.title: Unicorns
1.description: Our portfolio companies have reached unicorn status, and our founders maintain a large amount of equity.

2.title: Process
2.description: Our transparent and open investment process ensures you always know where you are in our process.

3.title: $400k+
3.description: We're passionate about helping founders grow fast, and our average initial cheque size is $400k.

portfolioSection.title: Our investments are top-tier
portfolioSection.description: Most of our portfolio companies have achieved unicorn exits with our founders holding majority equity.

teamSection.title: We found the best talent
teamSection.description: Our team is passionate about working with founders who break through barriers.
